article_title: Panel Finds Deep Problems at Secret Service
article_text:
WASHINGTON—The Secret Service needs more training, staff and a leader from outside its ranks to run an organization that has been stretched beyond its limits and become too insular, according to a report by a panel of outside experts appointed to examine the agency.

Much of the report is classified and won’t be released publicly, but the executive summary suggests the panel found deep problems at the top of the Secret Service, which...
